attributes.action: The Government should not get involved in the war between Israel and Iran.
attributes.additional_details: The war between Israel and Iran has nothing to do with the British and we should stay out of the conflict.
attributes.background: Parliament should vote against any British involvement in this war other than acting in self defense against either side.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730360
